Eili.name: Eili
Eili.description:
<c=42add1>Eili</c>
A bubbly little fellow who <c=keyword>loves to help others<c> with her <c=keyword>excentric solutions</c>.

Braid.name: Braid
Braid.description:
<c=c0c9e6>Braid</c>
A soldier who knows when victory necessitates <c=downside>sacrifice</c>.

DisabledDampeners.name: Disabled Dampeners
description: Whenever you are damaged, gain as much <c=status>EVADE</c> and <c=status>MOVE RANDOM</c> times this status.
<c=downside>Decreases by 1 at the start of each turn</c>.

ShockAbsorber.name: Shock Absorber
ShockAbsorber.description: Whenever you are damaged, gain as much <c=status>TEMP SHIELD NEXT TURN</c> times this status.

TempShieldNextTurn.name: Temp Shield Next Turn
TempShieldNextTurn.description: At the start of next turn, gain <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c>.
TempShieldNextTurn.combatDescription: At the start of next turn, gain <c=keyword>{[Amount]}</c> <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c>.

KineticGenerator.name: Kinetic Generator
description: Gain <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c> for any and all distance moved.
<c=downside>Decreases by 1 at the start of each turn</c>.

EqualPayback.name: Equal Payback
description: Whenever this ship is hit, it immediately fires a shot of equal damage.
<c=downside>Decreases by 1 at the start of each turn</c>.

TempPowerdrive.name: Temp Powerdrive
TempPowerdrive.description: Add damage to all attacks. <c=downside>Goes away at end of turn</c>.
TempPowerdrive.combatDescription: Add <c=keyword>{{Amount}}</c> damage to all attacks. <c=downside>Goes away at end of turn</c>.

Bide.name: Bide
Bide.description: Damage received is stored and added to next <c=keyword>attack</c>.

IdentifyWeakspot.name: Identify Weakspot
IdentifyWeakspot.description: A random enemy ship part gains Brittle until damaged.

description.None: A random ship part gains Armor until end of combat.
description.A: A random ship part gains Armor until end of combat.
description.B: All ship parts gain Armor until next turn.

description.None: Pick a card from your hand and remove its <c=cardtrait>exhaust</c>.
description.A: Pick a card from your hand and remove its <c=cardtrait>exhaust</c>.
description.B: Pick a card from your <c=keyword>draw pile</c> and remove its <c=cardtrait>exhaust</c>.

description.None: You and the enemy both lauch <c=midrow>asteroids</c> from all missile bays.
description.A: You and the enemy both lauch <c=midrow>mines</c> from all missile bays.
description.B: You and the enemy both lauch <c=midrow>missiles</c> from all missile bays.

description.None: <c=keyword>Discard</c> your hand. Add a <c=card>Max Blast</c> to your hand. <c=downside>Gain -1 Energy next turn</c>.
description.A: <c=keyword>Discard</c> your hand. Add a <c=card>Max Blast A</c> to your hand. <c=downside>Gain -1 Energy next turn</c>.
description.B: <c=keyword>Discard</c> your hand. Add a <c=card>Max Blast</c> to your hand. <c=downside>Gain -1 Energy next turn</c>.

description.None: Pierce attack. Dmg = Hull lost this combat.{{Amount}}
description.A: Pierce attack. Dmg = Hull lost this combat.{{Amount}}
B: Pierce attack. Dmg = Hull lost this combat. {{Amount}}

Retreat.name: Retreat
Retreat.description: <c=keyword>End combat</c> next turn and skip all rewards. <c=downside>Cannot be played during boss battles</c>.
